channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: AMD’s CIO On AI-Driven Transformation And The Future Of IT
item.description: AMD CIO Hasmukh Ranjan has the company on the path to take full advantage of advances in artificial intelligence.

item.title: The problem with ‘very’

item.title: HACLA Admits Data Breach By Cactus Ransomware Gang
item.description: The Housing Authority of the City of Los Angeles is once again dealing with a major data breach and ransomware incident.
